tags.name: code-editor
tags.description:
`code-editor`
`Wrapper on top of a code editor`

Events:

  * `show-code-pen-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ value: any; }>`} - 

  * `value-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ value: any; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `code-pen-data` - Code pen data, computed based on the HTML editor

  * `editor-value` {`string`} - contents of the editor

  * `value` {`string`} - value of the editor after the fact

  * `mode` {`string`} - Mode / language for editor

  * `show-code-pen` {`boolean`} - Show codePen button to fork it to there to run

  * `read-only` {`boolean`} - Readonly setting for the editor

  * `theme` {`string`} - Theme for the Ace editor.

  * `language` {`string`} - Language to present color coding for

  * `font-size` {`number`} - font size for the editor

  * `word-wrap` {`boolean`} - 

  * `tab-size` {`number`} - number of characters for tabs

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - automatically set focus on the editor

  * `hide-line-numbers` {`boolean`} - hide the line numbers

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - does the monaco-editor have focus

  * `libPath` {`string`} - 

  * `schema-resource-id` {`string`} - Unique Resource ID, generated when schemaMap processes.

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

Properties:

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `codePenData` - Code pen data, computed based on the HTML editor

  * `editorValue` {`string`} - contents of the editor

  * `value` {`string`} - value of the editor after the fact

  * `mode` {`string`} - Mode / language for editor

  * `haxUIElement` {`boolean`} - 

  * `showCodePen` {`boolean`} - Show codePen button to fork it to there to run

  * `readOnly` {`boolean`} - Readonly setting for the editor

  * `theme` {`string`} - Theme for the Ace editor.

  * `language` {`string`} - Language to present color coding for

  * `fontSize` {`number`} - font size for the editor

  * `wordWrap` {`boolean`} - 

  * `tabSize` {`number`} - number of characters for tabs

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - automatically set focus on the editor

  * `hideLineNumbers` {`boolean`} - hide the line numbers

  * `focused` {`boolean`} - does the monaco-editor have focus

  * `libPath` {`string`} - 

  * `schemaResourceID` {`string`} - Unique Resource ID, generated when schemaMap processes.

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

tags.name: code-pen-button
tags.description:
`code-pen-button`
`Post data to codepen to form a new pen`

Attributes:

  * `data-string` {`string`} - Data object as a JSON string for the POST data in page.

  * `check-it-out` {`string`} - 

  * `end-point` {`string`} - End point for posting should it change in the future.

  * `data` - Data object to post to code pen

Properties:

  * `dataString` {`string`} - Data object as a JSON string for the POST data in page.

  * `checkItOut` {`string`} - 

  * `endPoint` {`string`} - End point for posting should it change in the future.

  * `data` - Data object to post to code pen

attributes.name: data-string
attributes.description:
`data-string` {`string`} - Data object as a JSON string for the POST data in page.

Property: dataString

attributes.name: check-it-out
attributes.description:
`check-it-out` {`string`} - 

Property: checkItOut

Default: Check it out on codepen

attributes.name: end-point
attributes.description:
`end-point` {`string`} - End point for posting should it change in the future.

Property: endPoint

Default: https://codepen.io/pen/define

attributes.name: data
attributes.description:
`data` - Data object to post to code pen

Property: data

Default: [object Object]

tags.name: monaco-element
tags.description:
`monaco-element`
Webcomponent wrapper for the monaco editor.

Sets value, language and theme.
Offers a value-changed event.

Partly influenced by https://github.com/PolymerVis/monaco-editor

Events:

  * `value-changed` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `code-editor-focus` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

  * `code-editor-blur` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

  * `monaco-element-ready` {`CustomEvent<boolean>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `unique-key` {`string`} - THIS MAKES MULTIPLES EDITORS WORK BECAUSE OF EVENTS
DO NOT MESS WITH THIS AND IT HAS TO BE SET

  * `value` {`string`} - 

  * `font-size` {`number`} - 

  * `word-wrap` {`boolean`} - 

  * `tab-size` {`number`} - 

  * `read-only` {`boolean`} - 

  * `eventTypes` - 

  * `language` {`string`} - 

  * `theme` {`string`} - 

  * `lib-path` {`string`} - 

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - automatically set focus on the iframe

  * `hide-line-numbers` {`boolean`} - hide line numbers

  * `editor-reference` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `uniqueKey` {`string`} - THIS MAKES MULTIPLES EDITORS WORK BECAUSE OF EVENTS
DO NOT MESS WITH THIS AND IT HAS TO BE SET

  * `document` - 

  * `iframe` - 

  * `value` {`string`} - 

  * `fontSize` {`number`} - 

  * `wordWrap` {`boolean`} - 

  * `tabSize` {`number`} - 

  * `readOnly` {`boolean`} - 

  * `eventTypes` - 

  * `language` {`string`} - 

  * `theme` {`string`} - 

  * `libPath` {`string`} - 

  * `autofocus` {`boolean`} - automatically set focus on the iframe

  * `hideLineNumbers` {`boolean`} - hide line numbers

  * `editorReference` {`string`} -
